title: Pixel 2 randomly reboots
content:
My google pixel 2 keeps rebooting all the time, so it's impossible to use it. I've tried updating it and doing factory reset, but still no use.
Here's the video, that shows how phone works
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fyRHrH6NdIqU5J9PzAPQu2TGkcNcYMed/view?usp=drivesdk
